term.title: Kasha–Vavilov rule

item.text: The quantum yield of luminescence is independent of the wavelength of exciting radiation. There are exceptions to this rule.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2250 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
